biotools.summary: Software package to fit a Bayesian Gaussian mixture model (GMM) on the SNP array signal intensity data, and infer individual’s allele-specific copy number genotypes at genome-wide SNP loci in a SNP array.

bioschemas.name: PlatinumCNV
bioschemas.summary: Software package to fit a Bayesian Gaussian mixture model (GMM) on the SNP array signal intensity data, and infer individual’s allele-specific copy number genotypes at genome-wide SNP loci in a SNP array.
